title: Playing Fortnite
description: This class teaches the history, gameplay, basic controls, advanced strategies and tactics, and teamwork in the popular online game Fortnite.

modules.title: Introduction to Fortnite: History, Gameplay and Basic Controls

lessons.title: History of Fortnite: The Origins, Development and Popularity
lessons.info:
Lesson Content: In this lesson, we will be learning about the history of Fortnite. Fortnite was developed by Epic Games and released in 2017. The game was initially designed as a co-op survival game but later took on the form of a battle royale game following the success of games like PUBG. The game quickly gained popularity thanks to its free-to-play business model, cartoonish graphics, and gameplay mechanics.

One of the main factors behind Fortnite's success is its ability to continually evolve through constant updates and collaborations with popular franchises, such as Marvel and Star Wars. These collaborations led to various in-game events, limited-time modes, and crossover skins.

Practice Problem: Which game inspired the creation of Fortnite’s Battle Royale mode?

Quiz:
1. When was Fortnite released?
2. Why did Fortnite initially gain popularity?
3. How did Fortnite benefit from its collaborations with popular franchises?

Answers:
1. Fortnite was released in 2017.
2. Fortnite initially gained popularity due to its free-to-play business model, cartoonish graphics, and gameplay mechanics.
3. Fortnite benefitted from its collaborations with popular franchises by introducing new in-game events, limited-time modes, and crossover skins.

lessons.title: Overview of Fortnite Gameplay: Battle Royale, Creative, and Save the World
lessons.info:
Lesson Content: 

In this lesson, we will be delving into the different modes offered in Fortnite: Battle Royale, Creative, and Save the World. Battle Royale is the most popular mode where players fight each other until only one is remaining. Creative mode allows players to build custom maps and mini-games that can be shared with friends. Save the World is a cooperative mode where players fight against zombie-like creatures.

Battle Royale is the most popular mode of Fortnite. It is a player versus player (PvP) game where 100 players are dropped onto a large map and must fight each other until there is only one survivor. Players can scavenge for weapons, ammunition, and resources while trying to avoid a storm that shrinks the playable area. Creative mode allows players to design and build their own custom maps and mini-games which can be played with friends. Save the World is a cooperative mode where players work together to fight against zombie-like creatures called Husks. Players must also gather resources, build structures and defend against waves of Husks.

Quiz: 
1. What is Battle Royale and how many players participate?
2. In Creative mode, how can players build custom maps?
3. What is the objective in Save the World?
 
Answers:
1. Battle Royale is a player versus player (PvP) game with 100 players fighting until only one is remaining. 
2. Players can build custom maps in Creative mode by using a range of tools that include building materials, traps and objects. 
3. The objective in Save the World is to fight against zombie-like creatures called Husks and defend against waves of attacks.

lessons.title: Basic Controls and Navigation in Fortnite: Movement, Weapons, and Inventory
lessons.info:
Lesson Content:
In Fortnite, movement is key to survival. To move your character, you can use the left joystick on your controller or the W, A, S, and D keys on your keyboard. To jump, press the A or spacebar button. To crouch, press the B button or hold down the left joystick. You can climb up structures or hills by holding the right joystick in the upward direction or holding down the shift key on your keyboard.

To access your weapons and items, press the right bumper button on your controller or press the tab key on your keyboard. This will bring up your inventory screen where you can see all of your weapons and items. To use a weapon, simply press the right trigger button on your controller or click the left mouse button on your keyboard.

It is important to manage your inventory and make sure you have enough weapons and resources to survive throughout the game. You can gather items by searching through chests, scavenging around the map, or by using your pickaxe to destroy structures. It's important to note that items can only be carried in certain slots in your inventory, so it's important to plan accordingly.

Quiz:
1. What button do you press to jump in Fortnite?
2. How do you access your inventory screen?
3. What is the best way to gather items in Fortnite?
4. Can all items be carried in any slot in your inventory?
Answers:
1. A or Spacebar
2. Right bumper button on your controller or tab key on your keyboard
3. By searching through chests, scavenging, and using a pickaxe to destroy structures
4. No, items can only be carried in certain slots in your inventory.

lessons.title: Character Customization and Skins in Fortnite
lessons.info:
Lesson Content:
In Fortnite, character customization and skins are an important aspect of gameplay that allows players to show off their unique personality and style. When players first start out, they are given a default skin that they can change to another one in the game's item shop or by leveling up. Skins can range from animals and superheroes to seasonal apparel like Halloween costumes, and players can even customize their skins with various colors and styles. 

Understanding the importance of skins in Fortnite is crucial because skins are not just for aesthetics, but they also provide an advantage in the game. It can make players less visible in certain environments, which means it can be a form of camouflage to avoid being targeted. Players can also purchase “back bling” and other accessories to further enhance their customization.

To conclude, character customization and skins are some of the exciting features in Fortnite and a crucial aspect of the game. By adding more skins, emotes and animations, it keeps the gameplay fresh and exciting, and lets players express their unique style and personality.


Quiz:
1. Why are skins important in Fortnite?
2. What are the two ways to obtain skins in the game?
3. What is "back bling"?
Answers:
1. Skins in Fortnite can be both for aesthetics and a way to gain an advantage in the game by making players less visible in certain environments.
2. Players can purchase skins from the item shop or earn them through leveling up.
3. "Back bling" is an accessory that can be worn on the back of a player's skin.

lessons.title: Teamwork and Communication in Fortnite: Solo, Duos, and Squads.
lessons.info:
Lesson Content: 
When playing Fortnite, communication and teamwork are incredibly crucial to winning. In Solo, players must rely on their own skills and decision-making to outlast 99 other players. Duos and Squads, on the other hand, require excellent communication to coordinate tactics, support each other, and win. 

One of the most critical aspects of communication in Fortnite is callouts. Callouts are brief and concise statements made by players to their team that lets them know what’s happening or where an enemy or objective is located. Common callouts include “Enemy spotted!”, “Need backup!”, “Building southeast!” and “Resuscitating teammate!” These can be learned from some of the many Fortnite content creators on Youtube and other platforms. Having a designated IGL, or in-game leader, can be extremely helpful in coordinating communication and strategy. 

In terms of teamwork, it's essential to work together to survive and win. This may mean reviving downed teammates, sharing materials, distributing weapons and ammo among team members, and prioritizing communication-based objectives. It's important to make sure everyone is comfortable with their role - for example, one player being designated as the dedicated sniper - and then create a plan based on that. By working together and communication through callouts, Fortnite players can achieve victory royales and become successful players. 

Quiz:
1. What are callouts in Fortnite?
2. Why is it important to have a designated IGL?
Answers:
1. Brief and concise statements made by players to their team that lets them know what’s happening or where an enemy or objective is located.
2. To coordinate communication and strategy.

modules.title: Advanced Strategies and Tactics in Fortnite: Building, Scavenging, and Combat.

lessons.title: Advanced Building Techniques: Double and Triple Ramp Rushing, 90° Degree Turns, and Wall Replace Technique.
lessons.info:
Lesson Content: 

Advanced Building Techniques are essential to being successful in Fortnite. In this lesson, we will be discussing Double and Triple Ramp Rushing, 90° Degree Turns, and Wall Replace Techniques. Double and triple ramp rushing require you to quickly build two to three ramps side by side to gain high ground advantage over your opponent. 90° degree turns allow you to quickly turn your ramp 90° while building, giving you a wider span to run across. Finally, the wall replace technique is where you quickly destroy a wall in order to place your own wall and gain control of a specific area. 

For example, when using the double ramp rushing technique, you will want to start by placing a ramp and wall. Then quickly place another ramp next to that one, and finish with walls on either side. This will give you a wide base to run on, and allow you to gain high ground quickly. For the 90° degree turn, while building a ramp, quickly press the turn button to snap the ramp in the desired direction. Finally, for the wall replace technique, quickly switch to building your own wall and aim for the weak spots in an opponent's wall. When their wall breaks, quickly place your own wall in its place to deny them control of the area.

Practice Problem: 
You are in a build battle and your opponent has the high ground. How can you quickly gain the advantage by using double ramp rushing? 

Solution to Problem: 
Place one ramp to start, and then quickly place two more ramps side by side. Finish by placing walls on either side. This will give you a wide base to run on and the high ground advantage. 

Summary:
In this lesson, we learned about advanced building techniques such as double and triple ramp rushing, 90° degree turns, and wall replace techniques. These skills are essential for gaining the high ground advantage and controlling the battlefield. Remember to practice these skills to become proficient at them.

lessons.title: Scavenging and Looting Tips and Tricks: Hot Drops, Llama Hunting and Loot Paths.
lessons.info:
Lesson Content:
Scavenging and Looting Tips and Tricks: Hot Drops, Llama Hunting and Loot Paths.

Scavenging and looting are essential in Fortnite since players need to find weapons and supplies to stay alive. Thus, this lesson will focus on three specific techniques that will help you become more efficient and effective at scavenging and looting: Hot Drops, Llama Hunting and Loot Paths.

Firstly, hot drops are locations where multiple players land in the early game to try and get the best weapons and loot available. Some popular hot drop locations include Tilted Towers, Retail Row, and Salty Springs. Landing in a hot drop can be risky since many other players are likely to land there, but it is also a great way to get the best gear and start the game on the right foot.

Secondly, Llamas are large supply drops that can be found scattered across the map. They contain a massive amount of resources and useful items such as rare weapons, ammo, and building materials. Finding them can be tricky since Llamas are often hidden away in less traveled areas, but the rewards are usually worth the effort.

Lastly, loot paths refer to the routes taken by players to quickly find and collect loot. Knowing the best loot paths in each location can save valuable time, so it's important to learn the layout of each area. Some loot paths to consider include starting on the outskirts of a location and then working your way in, or sprinting through low-risk areas to avoid engaging in combat until you have the appropriate gear.

By mastering these techniques, you will become a more efficient looter and be better equipped to handle whatever challenges come your way.

Quiz:

1. What are hot drops?

2. What are Llamas?

3. Why is it important to know loot paths?

Answers:

1. Hot drops are locations where multiple players land in the early game to try and get the best weapons and loot available.

2. Llamas are large supply drops that contain a massive amount of resources and useful items such as rare weapons, ammo, and building materials.

3. Knowing loot paths is important to save valuable time and collect loot more efficiently.

lessons.title: Combat Strategies and Tactics: Proper Weapon Selection and Utilization, Positioning, and Covering.
lessons.info:
Lesson Content: Combat Strategies and Tactics: Proper Weapon Selection and Utilization, Positioning, and Covering

In Fortnite, having the right weapon is essential to winning battles. In this lesson, we will learn how to select the proper weapon and utilize it effectively in combat. We will also learn about positioning and covering, which will help us outmaneuver our opponents.

Firstly, we need to understand the concept of weapon rarity. In Fortnite, weapons are differentiated by their rarity, from Common (grey) to Legendary (orange). Generally speaking, the higher the rarity of a weapon, the stronger it is. However, it is important to remember that a skilled player with a lower rarity weapon can still beat a less skilled player with a higher rarity weapon. This means that we need to choose our weapon based on the situation at hand.

Secondly, positioning and covering play a crucial role in winning battles. When engaging in combat, we want to make sure that we are in a position of advantage. This could mean having high ground or cover. High ground allows us to have a better view of the situation and makes it easier for us to aim and shoot accurately. Cover provides protection from incoming fire, giving us time to heal and reload. We need to be aware of our surroundings and use them to our advantage.

Quiz:
1. What is weapon rarity?
2. Why is positioning important in Fortnite?

Answers:
1. Weapon rarity is how Fortnite classifies weapons based on strength, from Common (grey) to Legendary (orange).
2. Positioning is important in Fortnite because it can provide an advantage in combat, such as having high ground or cover.

lessons.title: End Game Approaches: Rotations, Zone Awareness, and High Ground Stealing.
lessons.info:
Lesson Content: 

End Game Approaches: 
In Fortnite Battle Royale, the game gets more intense as the players' numbers decrease. This means that the end game requires different strategies than the earlier stages. Here are three key things you need to know about End Game Approaches: rotations, zone awareness, and high ground stealing. 

Rotations: As the storm closes, it's important to plan your rotation. Rotations allow you to move with the storm and gain better positioning for the final fights. Make sure to have a good awareness of the terrain which can help you understand where you should rotate and where you should avoid. 

Zone Awareness: Keeping an eye on the circle can be vital in the end game. Knowing how much time you have to rotate and where to go can help you stay one step ahead of other players. Always keep in mind the circle is not static and it will close faster and deal more damage the closer you get to late stage circles. 

High Ground Stealing: The high ground is an important factor in all stages of Fortnite play. In the end game, players often build high structures to gain an advantage over their enemies. By constructing ramps, cones, or walls, you can quickly gain the high ground over other players and eliminate them before they can even react. 

Quiz:
1. What is the difference in End Game strategies compared to earlier stages? 
2. Why is it important to have Zone Awareness in the end game? 
3. What is High Ground Stealing and how can you utilize it in the end game?
Answers:
1. The end game needs different strategies due to the decrease in players and the higher intensity.
2. Zone Awareness helps you to stay ahead of other players and to plan your rotations.
3. High Ground Stealing is where you build and obtain the high ground to have an advantage over your enemies.
